body.p: A meeting creator has the option of deleting the meeting. Both meeting creators and participants have the option of removing the meeting from the My meetings list.

section.title: To delete a meeting
section.p: To delete a meeting for which you are the creator:

ol.li: From your My meetings list in the MiTeam Meetings home screen, right-click the meeting you want to delete. A panel opens.

Click Delete meeting. From the confirmatory panel that appears, click Delete meeting. The meeting will be deleted, along with all associated chats and files, from your My meetings list, and from the My meetings list of all participants of the meeting.

section.title: To remove a meeting from the My meetings list
section.p: Both meeting creators and participants can remove a meeting from their My meetings list.
To remove a meeting from your My meetings list:

ol.li: From your My meetings list in the MiTeam Meetings home screen, right-click the meeting you want to remove. A panel opens.
To remove the meeting from your list, click Remove from list. The meeting will be removed from your My meetings list.

section.p: After you remove a meeting from you My meetings list, you will not see the meeting in your list, and you will not receive any notifications regarding this meeting.

All others will continue to be part of the meeting, and the meeting will be listed in their My meetings list. The existing chat messages sent by you will continue to be visible to them in their chat conversation history.

You will be able to join the meeting again and receive notifications if you are invited to this meeting, and accept the invitation. After you join the meeting, the meeting will again be listed in the My meetings list of your MiTeam Meetings application.
